notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: F.S., S.M. and G.P. performed the chemical experiments. G.S. and M.G.V. sampled biological specimens. G.L.R., F.L.C. and M.G.V. conceived the experiments. G.L.R. and M.G.V. interpreted results. M.D.S. performed statistical analysis. G.P., G.L.R. and M.G.V. wrote the paper.
